content: I think I'll use Todoist to help me stay organized and on track. I've already started using it to manage my daily tasks, so it makes sense to use it for my personal projects as well. I'll create separate projects for each of my goals, and break them down into smaller, actionable tasks. This will help me stay focused and make progress on each project. I might also set reminders and deadlines to ensure I stay on track. Additionally, I'll make sure to review my progress regularly and adjust my schedule as needed.
